Package scene

Interface Builder

All Known Implementing Classes:
SceneBuilder
public interface Builder
The Builder interface defines methods for constructing a Scene. Implementations of this interface allow the step-by-step assembly of a Scene by setting various components such as Camera, Image, Lights, Objects, and Colors.

  • Method Summary

    Description

    Build and return the Scene based on the provided components.

  • Method Details

    • withCamera

      void withCamera(Camera cam)
      Set the Camera for the Scene being built.
      Parameters:
      cam - The Camera object to be used in the Scene.

    • withImage

      void withImage(Image img)
      Set the Image for the Scene being built.
      Parameters:
      img - The Image object to be rendered in the Scene.

    • withLights

      void withLights(List<ILight> lights)
      Set the lights for the Scene being built.
      Parameters:
      lights - A list of ILight objects representing the lights in the Scene.

    • withObjets

      void withObjets(Map<IObjetScene,IColorStrategy> objets)
      Set the objects and their color strategies for the Scene being built.
      Parameters:
      objets - A map associating IObjetScene objects with their corresponding IColorStrategy.

    • withColors

      void withColors(Map<String,Color> colors)
      Set the color definitions for the Scene being built.
      Parameters:
      colors - A map associating color names with Color objects.

    • build

      Scene build()
      Build and return the Scene based on the provided components.
      Returns:
      A fully constructed Scene object.
